name: Niuma
description: "Oxen and horses" symbolize the true creators of the vast majority of the world's wealth and value. $NIUMA brings this cultural IP to the blockchain, giving it a new meaning: it is no longer a neglected labor force, but an awakening consensus force. $NIUMA - Culture builds consensus Cultural consensus Ã— Financial Revolution: IP familiar to hundreds of millions of people + the strongest narrative in the cryptocurrency world = explosive potential Grassroots awakening, refusing to be silent: This is the currency of ordinary people, advocating for all underestimated strivers
